allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(rutracker\): raise auth error when login page detected without credentials

Previously, when Rutracker returned a 200 response with login form HTML
\(instead of a redirect\), the code would silently return the login page
content, causing the parser to find 0 results.

Now raises RutrackerAuthError in both cases:
- 302 redirect to login page
- 200 response with login form content

Added test for the new scenario.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(rutracker\): improve HTML parsing with better selectors and logging

- Add multiple CSS selectors to try for finding search result rows
- Add detection of "no results" messages in page content
- Add detailed logging for debugging \(selector used, has_tor_tbl, has_tlink\)
- Retry search without category filter if no results found
- This helps diagnose parsing failures when Rutracker HTML structure changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(search\): add TorAPI as primary search method for Rutracker

TorAPI \(https://github.com/Lifailon/TorAPI\) is an unofficial API gateway
that provides reliable JSON API access to Rutracker and other trackers.

Benefits:
- No authentication required \(API handles it\)
- Clean JSON responses \(no HTML parsing fragility\)
- Works without VPN \(API acts as gateway\)
- Public free instance at torapi.vercel.app

The search flow now:
1. Try TorAPI first \(more reliable\)
2. Fall back to direct scraping if TorAPI fails

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash([1080p] 14.5G S:245"
This helps distinguish between similar torrents.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(Title.."
Info comes first so it''s always visible on narrow buttons.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
